item.title: Pedicting March Madness using Machine Learning
item.description: As a project for my SPMC 460 Advanced Sports Data Analytics class, we were tasked to accurately predict the 2021 March Madness tournament. Each student was to come up with an algorithm that they though would best predict each game. We entered our brackets in to an ESPN bracket challenge to see which student had the top algorithm during this crazy COVID basketball season. What follows is the logic and code I used to fill out my bracket.
